New Website!

19 May 2015

So I have decided to switch from the custom setup I had before (based of the python framework flask & apache) to a much simpler one using Jekyll & nginx. Why Jekyll? Well it is one of the more popular static site generators & I have some experience from converting my sister's website over to it a few months back (beckymiller.co.uk). Currently I have used the Hyde theme as it caught my eye, but I hope to move to my own design before long.

Given Jekyll is designed for blogs, I hope to start writing more posts, especially since I have now setup Travis CI to deploy this site automatically.
